job_title: Azure + Terraform Engineer with Gen AI
jd: From: Isaac, Centraprise isaac@centraprise.com Reply to: isaac@centraprise.com Hi Professional, I am writing to let you know regarding a job opportunity as “Azure + Terraform Engineer with Gen AI” with “Cognizant”. Mentioned is the job description for your review. Job Title: Azure + Terraform Engineer with Gen AILocation: Phoenix AZ (Day One Onsite) Job Type: Contract Job Description: Azure + Terraform Engineer with Gen AI If interested, please fill the below details and revert with your updated resume. Candidate Full Name Current Location Phone Email ID Skype ID Linked in ID Passport number Total Years of Experience Education Visa Status Willing to relocate Rate Last 4 Digits of SSN#: Availability to start on the project Previously worked with Cognizant (Y/N) If Yes – Provide the CTS Emp ID Interview Availability with the time Zone Thanks & RegardsIsaacIsaac@centraprise.comDirect: 469-923-8111Centraprise
